content:
ShouldRetry ShouldRetry Delegate

In this Article

Edit

Defines a callback delegate that will be invoked whenever a retry condition is encountered.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate bool ShouldRetry(int retryCount, Exception lastException, out TimeSpan delay);Public Delegate Function ShouldRetry(retryCount As Integer, lastException As Exception, ByRef delay As TimeSpan) As Boolean

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling

Assembly

Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.NetStandard.dll
